actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to permit the Congress to propose popular referenda as the mode by which the several States may ratify an amendment to the Constitution.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Authorizes Congress to propose that popular referenda be the mode of ratification used by the States to amend the Constitution.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to permit the Congress to propose popular referenda as the mode by which the several States may ratify an amendment to the Constitution.
